todos.title: Outlies Reduction
todos.body: Standardize data and view outliers.  (=STANDARDIZE(DATA, STDEV, MEAN))

todos.title: Qualitative Data
todos.body: Must be turned into quantitative data as individual yes no variables.  Can't turn them into numerical categories because the computer will think that four is four times greater than one, etc.

todos.title: Stat Tools
todos.body: ME > XL, NumXL Pro, XLSTAT, Tableau.

todos.title: Collect Data
todos.body: Identify the variables or dimensions you that describe your subjects.
